subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin finished in 10.15 seconds to win the 100 meters at a meet near Venice in the last race on his return from a four-year doping ban before he goes back to the United States to prepare for the indoor season
snippet: Justin Gatlin finished in 10.15 seconds to win the 100 meters at a meet near Venice in the last race on his return from a four-year doping ban before he goes back to the United States to prepare for the indoor season
